mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORGANIZATION_CHART_COPY (HIGH_DEPARTMENT_ID, DEPARTMENT_ID, DEPARTMENT_NAME,REG_DATE,UPDATE_DATE) select #{highDepartmentId}, #{departmentId}, #{departmentName}, trunc(sysdate), trunc(sysdate) from dual WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ORGANIZATION_CHART_COPY WHERE HIGH_DEPARTMENT_ID = #{highDepartmentId} and DEPARTMENT_ID = #{departmentId} and DEPARTMENT_NAME = #{departmentName})

INSERT INTO PROJECT_HISTORY_COPY (PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID , PROJECT_ID,REG_DATE,UPDATE_DATE) select #{participationEmployeeId},#{projectId},trunc(sysdate),trunc(sysdate) from dual WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM PROJECT_HISTORY_COPY WHERE PROJECT_ID = #{projectId} and PARTICIPATION_EMPLOYEE_ID = #{participationEmployeeId})
